mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM board

SELECT rn, bno, writer, title, contents, regdate, hits, ip, status FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, bno, writer, title, contents, regdate, hits, ip, status FROM (SELECT bno, writer, title, contents, regdate, hits, ip, status FROM board ORDER BY bno desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNo} ) WHERE RN >= #{startNo}
SELECT bno, writer, title, contents, regdate, hits, ip, status FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno}
